vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δεσμ-εύω,
fetter, put in chains, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; tie together, as corn in the sheaf, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; χόρτον [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; δ. ἔκ τινος bind fast to.., [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II lay snares for, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to tie up, bind; to arrest
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to tie up, bind; to arrest
to bind, bind up, as a bundle, Mt. 23:4; to bind, confine, Lk. 8:29; Acts 22:4*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bị xiềng; bị xiềng xích; bắt trói; trói buộc
